body.description: Safety 1st Teeny Ultra Compact Stroller As a proud parent, you know that big things come in small packages. And the same is true for strollers. The Teeny Ultra Compact Stroller is lightweight, delightfully small and perfect for travel. (Kind of like a baby who loves to nap on the go!) Ultra-compact fold with one hand for easy storage Comfortable, padded carry handle Generous canopy, plus flip-out visor provides added sun protection Peek-a-boo window offers a quick look in Large, easy access storage basket XL cup holder

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our Philosophy At Safety 1st we’re not scared of a little dark. We don’t shy away from a 2am cough. We let our toddlers race down spiraling slides…by themselves. We go swimming immediately after eating. We take long road trips, without electronics. We’re a new generation of parent – a new breed of safety crusaders. We protect by permitting. We risk more by not risking anything. And that’s not a risk we’re willing to take. Safety 1st Teeny Ultra Compact Stroller As a proud parent, you know that big things come in small packages. And the same is true for strollers. The Teeny Ultra Compact Stroller is lightweight, delightfully small and perfect for travel. (Kind of like a baby who loves to nap on the go!) Ultra-compact fold with one hand for easy storage Comfortable, padded carry handle Generous canopy, plus flip-out visor provides added sun protection Peek-a-boo window offers a quick look in Large, easy access storage basket XL cup holder

Made in the Shade Extra-large canopy lets your child sit comfortably in the shade on the brightest days, with a flip-out visor to protect from oncoming glare. Ultra-compact Fold with One Hand for Easy Storage The lightweight Teeny folds and carries with one hand, and without the help of professional movers! At 15 pounds, it rivals the weight of your overstuffed handbag. Cup-Zilla Cup Holder Includes one HUGE cup holder. It holds a super-size ice coffee, that can be attached on the left or right side.

Flip Flops Welcome Sure, those sneaks are comfy, but sometimes you want something comfy and stylish. Teeny’s flip-flop friendly brakes make it simple to put the stroller into park. Large Easy Access Basket Teeny may be, well… teeny, but it doesn’t skimp on storage space. You can fit a diaper bag and more into this basket! Even More Stuff in the Pocket Covered pocket near the handlebar that lets you keep your keys, wallet and cell phone handy but out of view.
2020 NAPPA Recipient The Teeny Ultra Compact Stroller is a 2020 National Parenting Product Awards winner!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hands down- the BEST
reviews.reviewText: First off, I have purchased around 6 different strollers looking for the perfect one!I wanted something- lightweight, reclines, storage basket, cute and comfy for my daughter. She is 14 months so I wanted something that she won’t Outgrow in a couple months.This stroller has exceeded my expectations! I definitely recommend it. And it folds so smooth and small!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact, lightweight and easy to open stroller.
reviews.reviewText: Compact and easy to open and close. No setup was necessary. You have to remember the latch on the side prior to opening, closing it will self- latch. Closes into a compact size no bigger than my child's space saver Fisher Price high chair. Easy to manuver, my 5 year old can easily push the baby (supervised). The leg rests adjust with the click on the buttons on side and can be positioned flat or slightly downwards. Back rest looks a little awkward with the canopy shade when reclined all the way up, but will recline to a low position for resting. I bought an extra stroller organizer for a sturdier cupholder and pocket for items. Bottom storage basket is huge and nice to fit diaper bag or shopping items. Good purchase for infant to growing toddler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An absolute must for travel
reviews.reviewText: This stroller is amazing! It’s small and compact once folded, you can easily carry with one hand. You can push ONE HANDED which is a must when you’re traveling through an airport. Takes up very little space in the car. The cup holder is removable and can be used on either side of the stroller which is very useful. You do need to use 2 hands to recline the seat, and put it back together, also, when you fold the stroller to make sure the latch clips or un clips you’ll need both hands. Overall, a really great travel stroller, especially for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use & convenient
reviews.reviewText: We keep this in the car for our toddler and it has been great to have on hand for museum or shopping trips. It folds small, is super light. I can fold and unfold it with one hand while holding a 2yr old. The storage basket fits a child’s coat and our diaper bag. The seat is pretty padded & comfy and it gives our guy the ‘private space’ he needs sometimes in loud/busy settings.***update*** we used this for a long airplane trip through two major airports and it worked great, and fit in the overhead bin. I did purchase a stroller bag to stow it in so that it wouldn’t be spotted and get gate checked, it looks a little bulky when not in a bag so I recommend doing the same.Unfortunately during an unrelated mall outing my two year old somehow snapped the back in half so it can no longer be used. It didn’t last quite a year. With the frequency we find ourselves still needing a stroller like this we’ll be replacing it with something a little sturdier

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Travel Stroller
reviews.reviewText: We needed a lightweight stroller that was easier to fold for our upcoming Disney trip and this stroller was it! We loved how easy it was to fold down and carry onto the transportation buses. It rolled with ease as well and held up on all those long walks around the parks and resorts. We loved the extra compartment bag on the back of the stroller and the bottom compartment held a lot as well. Most importantly it was comfortable for my toddler to take naps in while on the go, it reclines all the way down and love that you can extend the bottom to not have their legs dangling while napping. This stroller was game changer for us!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stroller for so many reasons! Airplane friendly!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this stroller specifically to travel with my newborn and it definitely met my expectations. With one push it opens and closes so easily. It’s light weight and so easy to handle. I definitely am happy with my purchase. I did buy a little insert to support his neck but this stroller leans back so the neck isn’t a big issue. I am so happy with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We bought this as a travel stroller for our 18 month old (25 lbs), and it's a great stroller for the price! It folds and unfolds easily, and is lightweight enough to carry with one hand. Once unfolded, it doesn't feel flimsy, has sturdy back support, and my daughter is comfortable in it. We've taken it on walks on pretty uneven terrain, and it never felt rickety or like it was getting loose/damaged. The ONE negative I have for it is that the buckle to lower/lift the back of the seat can get stuck from time to time while you're moving it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible keep the box
reviews.reviewText: This was the only stroller that was willing to come on time for our month trip to Europe. Our mistake was a last week purchase. I Ordered the 1st one and it came damaged. Then returned it ordered another one same company because we were desperate and needed it now within 2 days and did wanna spend a lot. Which that broke during our trip in Europe the cup holder is really weak and straps are not that great and if your child is a toddler or tall like ours they won’t really fit even if you lift the feet thing. We had to company again because it damaged over there and we basically had no stroller coming back and had to figure out what to do and make a broken stroller work some how for the 18 hour travel and 2 flights.

reviews.reviewTitle: Súper práctica, buena calidad y resistente.
reviews.reviewText: He tenido un par de carriolas y buscaba una que fuera más compacta, ligera y que soportara más peso. Ésta tiene todo eso.La recomiendo para niños un poco más grandes, la uso para un niño de 3 años y le queda muy cómoda. Tengo un bebé de 8 meses, pero para tan pequeños no la recomiendo mucho ya que es amplia y no parecen ir tan cómodos. La uso con él también pero para paseos cortos.Se maneja muy bien, se desliza muy bonito y aunque las ruedas son un poco pequeñas y a veces se llega a atorar en las grietas de las banquetas no es algo que me agobie mucho.El tamaño es excelente. La puedo guardar al pie de las sillas de los niños en el auto y no hay necesidad de mandarla a la cajuela.No cuenta con bolsa transportadora pero en verdad no la necesito ya que cuenta con una agarredarera que hace fácil su transportación.
Arrived in 2 days. Super affordable and good quality stroller, highly recommended

Es práctica y ligera. Con una mano la puedes doblar y con la otra cargar al bebé como a veces le hago. No es tan cómoda de la silla porq es algo dura pero se soluciona con algun cojín o sabana suave. Aguanto un viaje en avión sin romperse ni deformarse. También cabe arriba pero no me dejaron subirla. Por la calidad precio y sobre todo lo ligera que es y fácil de armar, la recomiendo bastante. De todas las q vi y compare, considero que vale mucho la pena. Lo único que no nos encanto es que se tardo como un mes y medio en llegar. Pero la compramos con una súper oferta así que valió la pena la espera.
This mesh up part can be only fold one direction and it seems fragile and will break if it was accidentally fold the reverse. Not sure if it can hold on the weight..

Si lo que buscan es un modelo compacto nos parece que es una de las mejores opciones. Nos encantó, es súper practica, cómoda, ligera, fácil de transportar, de conducir, el color es muy lindo, el espacio de la parte baja es bastante amplio y de fácil acceso. Es fácil de plegar y compactar. Es una lástima que no tenga la bolsa para transportar la carriola, fuera de eso es muy buena.
